alert.note: Alert for Daviess (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 4:58AM EST until January 12 at 5:15AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL SPENCER AND CENTRAL DAVIESS COUNTIES... At 357 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Owensboro, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Rockport around 405 AM CST. This includes the following highways... Interstate 165 between Mile Markers 68 and 70. Audubon Parkway between Mile Markers 20 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
